resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: Public Ferry coming in from Rapallo

Likely vantage point for a much earlier panorama of Portofino focusing on Castello Brown https://archive.org/details/pc301v_202004/PC301r.jpg   And for a straight panorama from the same time of Positano FROM Castello Brown https://archive.org/details/pc301v_202004
resource.chars:
Likely vantage point for a much earlier panorama of Portofino focusing on Castello Brown

https://archive.org/details/pc301v_202004/PC301r.jpg

 

And for a straight panorama from the same time of Positano FROM Castello Brown

https://archive.org/details/pc301v_202004
